reviewText: Excelente, ademas se agradece la narracin de Pedro Armendariz, documental de invaluable valor cultural, da gusto invertir en conocer nuestra historia, con productos de esta calidad, gracias.

There are over 70 movies on amazon about Zapata. This one is very rustic, difficult to hear and the picture quality is poor. It's always difficult to focus on the movie when there are audio/visual issues.
